amendment.description: Amendment requires that a report be done on the cost-benefit analysis of migrating the management headquarters for the Air Force's Enterprise Logistics System Program Executive Office.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 148 printed in House Report 112-88 to require a report on the cost-benefit analysis of migrating the management headquarters for the Air Force's Enterprise Logistics System Program Executive Office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 300 - 120 (Roll no. 371).
